chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
Instead, I'll order an iPhone 13 Pro Max.

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

The customer is waiting for a refund. The quality charter period has already expired. Please initiate the refund today. Otherwise I will have to do it 

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

King regards
Esra Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the device seems to be locked with a code. Please assist the customer in unlocking the device for us.

Regards,
TB

Dear Backcare,

Please disregard the previous message.

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

 We are not allowed to ask our customers for the code, this is not permitted. Please perform a hard reset. Then you will not need a code.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

King regards
Esra Back Market customer Care
